plot: Dan investigates a legendary hijacking from the 1970s

Dan travels back to the 1970's and keeps running into a man who may have hijacked an airliner for ransom. Trying to unravel the man's true identity Dan even visits his own father at the newspaper, and sees how little he cared for his family. Using clues from his trips back, Dan plans to run a story exposing the real identity of the hijacker, but when the purpose of his trips becomes clear, Dan's motives change.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
